summary.value: A colorful and tenacious flower, favored by an ancient dynasty.

effects.effect:
You are immune to shaken and weak.

  • You Receive: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.zSg3jNvLG1FtqOAz]{Shaken Immunity} and @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.azrYbcObDaVQ5GBG]{Weak Immunity}

You treat your Might and Willpower as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).

  • You Receive: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.hX70STpGG5fgAAkp]{MIG Up} and @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.nXxz7GyqeIGtQpMG]{WLP Up}

You and every ally you can see treat your Might and Willpower as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).

  • Targets Receives: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.hX70STpGG5fgAAkp]{MIG Up} and @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.nXxz7GyqeIGtQpMG]{WLP Up}
